nodes.text: Star Wars: Dark Times Volume Five—Out of the Wilderness

Star Wars: Dark Times Volume Five—Out of the Wilderness is the fifth trade paperback of the Star Wars: Dark Times series of comics, covering the Out of the Wilderness story arc. It was released on October 24, 2012.

Everyone wants fugitive Jedi Dass Jennir. An assassin is hot on his heels, Darth Vader is also in the race to find him, and even the outlaw crew of the Uhumele are searching for their former companion. But for Jennir and his "partner" Ember Chankeli, those are distant concerns as they endure a scorching desert trek and an attack by deadly land pirates!
Even under a blazing sun, these are dark times!

Everyone wants fugitive Jedi Dass Jennir: a mysterious assassin is dogging his footsteps; just one step behind is dark lord Darth Vader, still obsessed with exterminating every last Jedi from the galaxy; and even the outlaw crew of the Uhumele are searching for their former shipmate. But for Jennir and his untrustworthy companion, Ember Chankeli, those are distant concerns after a crash landing on a desert moon where they're enduring scorching heat and an encounter with deadly land pirates...
